Reviews.Title: “Great Option!”
Reviews.Author: Nancy Q
Reviews.Content: nice stay close midway airport pick arrival plus breakfast included staff friendly helped print boarding pass stay recommended

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: brizzeyAustralia
Reviews.Content: stayed night flight chicago staff friendly efficient cookies desk afternoon noticed business centre quiet comfortable clean nice bathroom pillows nice comfortable stay 24 hour free shuttle tofrom airport definately stay flying midway didnt eat breakfast dept hotel hotel complex tgi friday lunchdinner convenient deliver menus

Reviews.Title: “Polite staff, Hotel quiet and clean.”
Reviews.Author: Ohioillinois
Reviews.Content: hotel reservations third party check weeks reservation charges staff accept cancelations parked car stay january flew midway car shuttle drivers polite helped luggage

Reviews.Title: “3 stars is being charitable”
Reviews.Author: Papadoc1000
Reviews.Content: hotel fine breakfast adequate pool greenish internet connection lousy near lobby cant imagine quiet spacious heat easy control lacking customers treated matter nice hotel rude oops forgot tell charges doing business breaks deal kinda forget tell formerly free parking lot considered revenue source 13night park car opinion amounts false advertising gouging arent paying valet service charge lot anyway hasnt charged past step short charging showers staff rude wasnt told parking fees reservations wasnt wouldnt shooting foot wouldnt cared traveling 80 yr gone elsewhere principle

Reviews.Title: “Bad memory”
Reviews.Author: TheWiZEGUY
Reviews.Content: remember hotel lady staff shouted hey youre drinking coffee serving food shocked hear disappointing family barely started serving guests treated

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: birdbear828
Reviews.Content: front desk extremely welcoming checked checked noticed hold card paid cash called spoke happy help rude stay burbs awesome customer service

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: mille125
Reviews.Content: pleasantly surprised wife picky travellers stay properties close midway airport flight werent expecting hotel surprised stay executive floor staff check check pleasant clean including bathroom usual amenities didnt expect breakfast surprisingly stay stay

Reviews.Title: “Smelly Carpet”
Reviews.Author: benfen6293
Reviews.Content: checking surprised uncleaned door reported desk immediately addressed desk clerk moved floor carpet thoughout hotel smell deferred maintenance choice hotels future stays

Reviews.Title: “Convenient Stay...”
Reviews.Author: DD31
Reviews.Content: stay cleaning walls thin hear neighbors water flushing service food gelato yummy wifi floor 19th connecting lobby connectivity pool nice fun kids location dont mind doing walking

Reviews.Title: “Over priced, loud ac”
Reviews.Author: engineer64
Reviews.Content: hotel cluster hotels share shuttle service free shuttle convenient ran 20 minutes hi express overpriced suggest looking hotels ok ac loud leave running night floor style units included breakfast ok priced 50 couple restaurants hotels ate hilton garden inn close return look little
